member.name: D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL
member.summary: Describes the set of features targeted by a Direct3D device.

member.name: D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL.D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL_1_0_CORE
member.summary: Allows Microsoft Compute Driver Model (MCDM) devices to be used, or more feature-rich devices (such as traditional GPUs) that support a superset of the functionality. MCDM is the overall driver model for compute-only; it's a scaled-down peer of the larger scoped Windows Device Driver Model (WDDM).

member.name: D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL.D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL_9_1
member.summary: Targets features supported by feature level 9.1, including shader model 2.

member.name: D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL.D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL_9_2
member.summary: Targets features supported by feature level 9.2, including shader model 2.

member.name: D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL.D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL_9_3
member.summary: Targets features supported by feature level 9.3, including shader model 2.0b.

member.name: D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL.D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL_10_0
member.summary: Targets features supported by Direct3D 10.0, including shader model 4.

member.name: D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL.D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL_10_1
member.summary: Targets features supported by Direct3D 10.1, including shader model 4.

member.name: D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL.D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL_11_0
member.summary: Targets features supported by Direct3D 11.0, including shader model 5.

member.name: D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL.D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL_11_1
member.summary: Targets features supported by Direct3D 11.1, including shader model 5 and logical blend operations. This feature level requires a display driver that is at least implemented to WDDM for Windows 8 (WDDM 1.2).

member.name: D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL.D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL_12_0
member.summary: Targets features supported by Direct3D 12.0, including shader model 5.

member.name: D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL.D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL_12_1
member.summary: Targets features supported by Direct3D 12.1, including shader model 5.

member.name: D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL.D3D_FEATURE_LEVEL_12_2
member.summary: Targets features supported by Direct3D 12.2, including shader model 6.5. For more information about feature level 12_2, see its specification page. Feature level 12_2 is available in Windows SDK builds 20170 and later.
